options.subject: New Ticket Generated - B R A N D
options.htmlContent:
Hi {{components.65c08164-7fb1-49d9-8044-6d2bf10dcaf0.value}}

Ticket Details:
Issue type: {{components.8c062404-133b-4c78-8b18-39b51e8e2f00.selectedOptionLabel}}

We will contact you once we have an update.

Thanks and regards
B R A N D
